Modification to Terms of Service

Within the limits of applicable law, the Company reserves the right to review and change this agreement at any time. You are responsible for regularly reviewing these Terms and Conditions. Continued use of the Service after such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes.
title: no promise to inform/notify

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: From the terms: "Within the limits of applicable law, the Company reserves the right to review and change this agreement at any time. You are responsible for regularly reviewing these Terms and Conditions. Continued use of the Service after such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes. "
